data.event: When Bracken County was organized in 1796, Augusta was the county seat.

event.title: 1839, a new county courthouse was built

data.event: In 1839, a new county courthouse was built at a more central location in Brooksville.

event.title: was formally incorporated by the state assembly in 1850

data.event: The city was formally incorporated by the state assembly in 1850.
